original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhātuno saddhivihārikassa bhikkhuno sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṁ paribhuñjati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasman upanandaḥ sakya puttaḥ bhātunaḥ saddhivihārikassa bhikkhuno sāmam cīvaram vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇam paribhuñjati

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: “ayaṁ, āvuso, āyasmā upanando sakyaputto mayhaṁ cīvaraṁ sāmaṁ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṁ paribhuñjatī”ti.
analyzed: āvuso āyasmai upanandaḥ sakya putto mayham cīvaram sāmam vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇam paribhuñjati iti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṁ paribhuñjissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmai upanandaḥ sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmam cīvaram vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇam paribhuñjissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, upananda, bhikkhussa sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṁ paribhuñjasī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tvam upananda bhikkhussa sāmam cīvaram vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇam paribhuñjasi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, bhikkhussa sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṁ paribhuñjissasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva moghapurisa bhikkhussa sāmam cīvaram vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇam paribhuñjissasi
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṁ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmam cīvaram vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇam paribhuñjeyya pācittiyam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti
dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhā

original: channaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ vikappanupagaṁ pacchimaṁ.
analyzed: channam cīvarānam aññataram cīvaram vikappana upagam pacchima

original: dve vikappanā— sammukhāvikappanā ca parammukhāvikappanā ca.
analyzed: dve vikappanā sammukhā a vikappanā ca parammukhā a vikappanā ca
imam cīvaram tuyham vikappemi itthannāmassa vā ati
imam cīvaram vikappana tthāya tuyham dammi iti

original: Tena vattabbo— “ko te mitto vā sandiṭṭho vā”ti?
analyzed: tena vattabbo kaḥ te mittaḥ vā sandiṭṭhaḥ vā ati

original: Tena vattabbo— “ahaṁ tesaṁ dammi, tesaṁ santakaṁ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karohī”ti.
analyzed: tena vattabbaḥ aham tesam dammi tesam santakam paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayam vā karohi iti

original: tassa vā adinnaṁ, tassa vā avissasanto paribhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: tassa vā a dinna tassa vā a vissasantaḥ paribhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa
appaccuddhāraṇe appaccuddhāraṇa saññī paribhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa
appaccuddhāraṇe appaccuddhāraṇa saññī paribhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Adhiṭṭheti vā vissajjeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: adhiṭṭheti vā vissajjeti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa
